complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Initialize Rust project with Axum foundation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the project initialization into specific setup tasks: dependency configuration, basic server setup, environment configuration, middleware setup, and project structure creation. Each subtask should be independently testable.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to multiple components (Axum, database, Redis, middleware) but well-defined setup tasks with clear dependencies and established patterns.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Configure PostgreSQL database with sqlx migrations
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into database-specific tasks: connection pool setup, individual table migrations (users, teams, team_members, tasks), foreign key constraints, and index optimization. Consider migration rollback strategies.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Higher complexity due to database schema design, foreign key relationships, performance considerations with indexes, and potential migration issues. Requires careful planning of table relationships.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set up Redis for caching and session management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into Redis-specific functionalities: connection pool setup, session management layer, rate limiting implementation, pub/sub channel configuration, and health check integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity involving multiple Redis use cases (sessions, rate limiting, pub/sub), connection pooling, and integration with the main application flow.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into security-focused subtasks: JWT service creation, authentication middleware, refresh token mechanism, password hashing utilities, login/logout endpoints, and token validation. Pay special attention to security best practices.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to security implications, token lifecycle management, refresh token rotation, and integration with multiple parts of the system. Critical for application security.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement OAuth2 integration for Google and GitHub
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into OAuth2 provider-specific tasks: OAuth2 client configuration, authorization flow implementation, callback handling, user profile integration, account linking logic, and JWT generation after OAuth2 success.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving external API integrations, OAuth2 flow complexity, error handling for external services, account linking logic, and security considerations for third-party authentication.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create user registration and profile management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Organize into user lifecycle tasks: registration with validation, email verification system, password reset flow, profile CRUD operations, and GDPR-compliant data export/deletion.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to email integration, validation logic, GDPR compliance requirements, and multiple interconnected user management features.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into authorization components: role definition and enum creation, authorization middleware implementation, permission checking utilities, role management endpoints, and team membership validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to security-critical nature, complex permission logic, middleware integration, and the need for comprehensive testing of access control scenarios.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into individual API endpoints: team creation, team retrieval with role checking, team updates, team deletion (soft delete), member listing, and member removal. Each endpoint should include proper authorization checks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to multiple CRUD operations, role-based access control integration, soft deletion logic, and member management functionality.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Organize into invitation workflow tasks: invite token generation with expiration, Redis storage for invite data, invite validation and display, invitation acceptance flow, and invite revocation functionality.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity involving token generation, Redis integration, expiration handling, and secure invitation workflows with proper validation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into task-specific endpoints: task creation with validation, task listing with filtering and pagination, single task retrieval, task updates with permission checks, soft deletion with retention, and advanced querying capabilities.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to comprehensive CRUD operations, complex filtering and pagination logic, soft deletion with retention policies, and integration with authorization system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into rate limiting components: Redis sliding window implementation, middleware integration, different limits for user types, rate limit header management, and error response handling for exceeded limits.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving Redis integration, sliding window algorithms, middleware implementation, and proper HTTP response handling for rate limiting.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set up WebSocket endpoint for real-time updates
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Organize into WebSocket functionality: connection upgrade handling, connection manager for session tracking, WebSocket authentication, message broadcasting system, connection lifecycle management, and connection limit enforcement.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to real-time communication requirements, connection management, authentication over WebSocket, broadcasting logic, and scalability considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into notification channels: Redis pub/sub integration, email service with SMTP, FCM push notification setup, user preference management, notification templating and scheduling, and notification history tracking.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving multiple external services (SMTP, FCM), Redis pub/sub, template systems, user preferences, and complex delivery logic across multiple channels.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into logging components: tracing dependency setup, structured JSON logging configuration, request tracing middleware, database query logging, error logging with context, and cross-service trace correlation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving structured logging setup, trace correlation, middleware integration, and ensuring comprehensive coverage without performance impact.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Organize into metrics categories: metrics registry setup, HTTP request metrics, database performance metrics, custom business metrics, metrics endpoint exposure, and health metrics for dependencies.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with well-established patterns for metrics collection, but requires careful consideration of performance impact and metric selection.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into health check types: liveness endpoint for basic health, readiness endpoint with dependency checks, database connectivity validation, Redis connectivity validation, and proper HTTP status code handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Lower complexity with straightforward implementation, but critical for production deployment and requires proper dependency checking logic.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into frontend setup tasks: React TypeScript project creation, Tailwind CSS configuration, dependency installation and setup, project structure organization, environment configuration, and theme system implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving modern React setup, TypeScript configuration, styling framework integration, and project structure decisions.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build authentication UI and API integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Organize into authentication components: login/register form creation, OAuth2 button integration, JWT token management, protected route implementation, authentication context setup, and logout functionality.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to OAuth2 integration, token management, React context patterns, and secure authentication flow implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into UI components: Kanban board layout creation, drag-and-drop implementation, task card components, WebSocket real-time integration, filtering and search functionality, and mobile responsiveness.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving complex UI interactions, drag-and-drop libraries, real-time updates, mobile touch handling, and state management for interactive components.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Docker and Kubernetes deployment configuration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into deployment components: multi-stage Dockerfile for API, React app Dockerfile with nginx, Kubernetes manifest creation, HPA configuration, ingress setup, and local development docker-compose.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity involving containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, scaling configuration, and production deployment considerations with multiple services.
